name: Cicadas
storyline: In the early summer of six years ago, my first life came to an end. I was adopted, accepted, and given a new name. The unease caused by the blank memory finally faded a little bit in the return to ordinary life. In the subsequent years, the gradually forgotten memories, together with the cicadas of that year, were sealed in the depths of darkness.
summary: Cicadas is an indie adventure galgame about sweet young high school romance. The haunting story is brought to you as visual novel, with beautiful music and voice acting. Interact with pretty girls to push the story forward.
